description:
Steps to reproduce should be:

1) Do NOT run "nova-manage db sync"
2) Start nova-compute
3) Run "nova-manage db sync"

What I'm finding is that the nova-compute service does not crash when the database schema is missing (we've prevented most things from truly crashing the daemon) but instead it will keep trying.

However, I believe the compute_nodes table only gets updated on init_host so when the update_available_resource periodic task rolls around you'll get the following traceback:

http://paste.openstack.org/show/35844/
title: update_available_resource can fail
